levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, every attack gives a stackable buff that grants <@ba.vup>+{atk_each_stack:0%}</> ATK (stacks up to 8 times), stacks are reset upon changing targets; during the skill duration, Sharp's HP will not drop below 1
